name: 薛文景
objective: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
schedule:
1.Composition of glass and glass-ceramics,Sodium oxide, calcium oxide, phosphate and silicate
2.Composition and mechanical properties in clinic,Density, hardness compressive, bending stress, modulus, and toughness
3.Form, phase, and function of bioactive glass.In forms of powder, coating, and bulk.
4.Bio-glass bone bonded interface
5.Bio-glass-bonding gel-layer, and cortical bone/cancellous bone
6.Composition of HA vs Bio-glass
7.Dehiscence rate
Oral tests
8.Load bearing implants A/W glass(Cerabone),Vertebral replacement.
9.Bioactive cement and composition
10.Young’s modulus and strss-strain
11.Apatite formation on metal
12.Surface of Ti metal on alkali treatment, heat treatment and soaking in SBF to form bio-glass.
13.Apatite formation on polymer (Option,Polymers including PET,PE, and PTTE).
14.Overview of bioactive glass and critallized glass ceramis
15.Mechanism of apatite formation is discussed in the final section as well
16.Oral tests
期末考試/報告　　　　　　　　　　　　 (open books and take home exam)
scorePolicy:
1.以課堂授課搭配團隊討論之技能說明與示範，結合習題作業以實作與檢討補充課堂時數限制，提高口試與學習成績百分比，使學生由口到手到而心到做學問。
2.評量方法：期中考30%，期末考35%，與上課隨堂口試表現35%。
materials:
1. Updated Jounals.
2.Novel biomedical materials based on glasses; T.Kokubo
